name: PowerBook X15
description: A high-end laptop offering excellent performance with a powerful Intel Core i9-12900H processor, NVIDIA RTX 3070 GPU, and a large 32GB DDR5 RAM. Ideal for gaming, content creation, and heavy multitasking.

name: SuperPhone Z10
description: A flagship smartphone powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, boasting a sharp OLED display, 33W fast charging, and a 4500mAh battery for long-lasting performance.

name: AeroBook A12
description: A slim and portable laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 5800U processor, 16GB RAM, and AMD Radeon Vega 8 GPU, ideal for productivity and casual entertainment.

name: SlatePad X7
description: A budget-friendly tablet with a 10.4-inch IPS display, powered by MediaTek Helio G95 and 4GB of RAM, suitable for everyday tasks and media consumption.

name: iPhone Pro 14
description: Apple's latest flagship with the A16 Bionic chip, a stunning OLED display, and impressive battery life, making it perfect for high-end performance and photography.
